name: Total Invasion
description:
Total Invasion is a Doom and Wolfenstein-inspired first person sickle thrower.

Yeah, it'd be better just to watch the video than have me explain it here.

Story:

A bunch of wraiths invaded the planet, petrified a bunch of people, and ruined your garden. It's now time to kick their butts.

This game was originally made for 7DFPS but has since been updated.
